languages.text: "Каменный лик {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} грозен, но не зрит, как в его ногах занимается пламя. Чело той, что зовет себя его карой, осеняет нимб из тел, что парят на орбите. Но не все горят одинаково — холодный расчет способен сломить даже праведный гнев. Канистра с прометием у твоих ног, а куда его вылить — решать лишь тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Каменный лик {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} грозен, но не зрит, как в его ногах занимается пламя. Чело той, что зовет себя его карой, осеняет нимб из тел, что парят на орбите. Но не все горят одинаково — холодный расчет способен сломить даже праведный гнев. Канистра с прометием у твоих ног, а куда его вылить — решать лишь тебе".

languages.text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."
languages.original_text: "Каменный лик {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} грозен, но не зрит, как в его ногах занимается пламя. Чело той, что зовет себя его карой, осеняет нимб из тел, что парят на орбите. Но не все горят одинаково — холодный расчет способен сломить даже праведный гнев. Канистра с прометием у твоих ног, а куда его вылить — решать лишь тебе".

The brow of the one who calls herself his retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}石头的面孔是可怕的，但它却看不到祂脚下的烈焰。那个女人自称是祂的怒火，她的头顶戴着由星轨上的尸体组成的光环。然而，那些尸体燃烧时的样子并不相同，冷酷的算计甚至足以冲破正义的怒火。在你脚下，放着一个装满钷素的罐子。至于要把它倒在哪里，完全由你自己说了算。”
languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}石头的面孔是可怕的，但它却看不到祂脚下的烈焰。那个女人自称是祂的怒火，她的头顶戴着由星轨上的尸体组成的光环。然而，那些尸体燃烧时的样子并不相同，冷酷的算计甚至足以冲破正义的怒火。在你脚下，放着一个装满钷素的罐子。至于要把它倒在哪里，完全由你自己说了算。”

languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the Emperor is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself his retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

languages.text: «El rostro pétreo del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} es aterrador, pero no ve las llamas a Sus pies. El ceño de la que se considera Su retribución está coronado por un halo de cadáveres que orbita a su alrededor. Pero no todos arden igual: el frío cálculo puede quebrantar incluso la furia justiciera. Hay un bidón de prometio a sus pies, y es decisión suya dónde verterlo».
languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

traits.locale_text: «El rostro pétreo del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} es aterrador, pero no ve las llamas a Sus pies. El ceño de la que se considera su retribución está coronado por un halo de cadáveres que orbita a su alrededor. Pero no todos arden igual: el frío cálculo puede quebrantar incluso la furia justiciera. Hay un bidón de prometio a sus pies, y es decisión suya dónde verterlo».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の石のような容貌は恐ろしいが、足元の炎は見えない。皇帝の報復を自称する者の眉は、屍の後光で覆われている。それでも、彼らはすべてを同じように燃やすわけではない。冷徹な計算が正義の怒りをも打ち砕く。その足元にはプロメチウムの容器があり、それをどこに注ぐかを決めるのはあなたの決断のみ」
languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の石のような容貌は恐ろしいが、足元の炎は見えない。皇帝の報復を自称する者の眉は、屍の後光で覆われている。それでも、彼らはすべてを同じように燃やすわけではない。冷徹な計算が正義の怒りをも打ち砕く。その足元にはプロメチウムの容器があり、それをどこに注ぐかを決めるのはあなたの決断のみ」

languages.text: "Das steinerne Antlitz des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} ist furchterregend, doch es sieht die Flammen zu seinen Füßen nicht. Die Braue der Frau, die sich seine Vergeltung nennt, wird von einem kreisrunden Heiligenschein aus Leichen gekrönt. Doch sie brennen nicht alle auf die gleiche Weise — kalte Berechnung kann selbst rechtschaffenen Zorn brechen. Zu Euren Füßen steht ein Kanister Promethium, und wohin Ihr es schüttet, ist allein Eure Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

Die Braue der Frau, die sich seine Vergeltung nennt, wird von einem kreisrunden Heiligenschein aus Leichen gekrönt. Doch sie brennen nicht alle auf die gleiche Weise — kalte Berechnung kann selbst rechtschaffenen Zorn brechen. Zu Euren Füßen steht ein Kanister Promethium, und wohin Ihr es schüttet, ist allein Eure Entscheidung."

languages.text: « Le visage de pierre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} inspire la peur, mais il ne voit pas les flammes qui lui lèchent les pieds. Le front de celle qui prétend incarner son châtiment est couronné d'un halo de cadavres. Mais tous ne brûlent pas de la même manière ; de simples calculs peuvent briser même les courroux les plus justifiés. Il y a une bonbonne de prométhium à vos pieds, et il ne tient qu'à vous de décider où la déverser. »
languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} sert siması, yüreklere korku salıyor. Lakin ayaklarının dibindeki alevleri görmüyor. Kendisine O'nun gazabı adını verenin alnında, etrafında cesetler dolanan haleden bir taç beliriyor. Ancak hepsinin alevi farklı. Duygusuz öngörüler, erdemlileri bile öfkeye boğabilir. Ayağının dibinde bir prometyum kabı var. Onu nereye dökeceğin, tamamen sana kalmış."
languages.original_text: "The stone visage of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is fearsome, but it does not see the flames at His feet. The brow of the one who calls herself His retribution is crowned by an orbital halo of corpses. But they do not all burn the same — cold calculation can break even righteous anger. There is a canister of promethium at your feet, and where to pour it is your decision alone."
